Questa persona è impegnata. Forse dovrei: Mi dispiace. Non volevo disturbarti.
[Vattene]
Vattene!
Vai, {s1} vai!
{s1}, aspetta!
Ecco, ho qualcosa per te...
Ti chiamo io...
Cane cattivo! Vattene! Non ti voglio più!
Buttala!
Ecco, ho una salsiccia!
Bravo cane!
Via!
Qui, ho qualcosa per te ...
Non sembri sano. Qui, hanno un {s7}!
Ecco, questo {s7} ti renderà più forte!
Voglio che tu sia più forte. Ecco alcuni {s7}. Và bene!
Sei troppo magra. Qui, hanno dei {s7}!
Puoi essere più veloce, amico mio. Ecco alcuni {s7} per te!
Ecco dei {s7} per i vostri denti!
Non ho più cibo per voi.
Per oggi questo è tutto.
Dovresti andare da tua madre e lasciargli qualcosa che puo usare sulla strada del Valhala.
Sto aspettando qualcuno che è venuto con una ragazza. Li hai visti?
Ah, sei {playername}. Thonkrik mi ha detto che saresti venuto qui. Sali sulla nave. I miei uomini ti mostreranno come è facile navigare.
Heill! Stai cercando di andare in un'altra città?
Si prega di aspettare tutti a bordo della nave.
Che cosa volete?
Salve. Sono venuto per far parte della flotta di Sven Bull Neck e Harald Haraldsson che andranno a Englaland.
Un uomo chiamato Atli Eiriksson ha lasciato questo porto un pò di tempo fa. Sa dove stava andando?
Ho dato le pelli a Hogni, ora tocca a te. Dove si trova Atli Eiriksson?
Ero a Gleann Da Loch e ho portato 'The Cathach di Colum Cille.'
Purtroppo, Gleann Da Loch è troppo lontano. Vuoi dei soldi?
Sai quello che voglio. Dove si trova il nascondiglio di Sven Bull Neck?
Voglio comprare una nave.
Seguimi!
Ho alcune domande su navi e viaggi in mare.
Cosa volete sapere?
Perché la gente va al mare?
Come mi oriento in mare?
Che cosa serve per comprare una nave?
Cosa rende una nave veloce?
Questo è quello che volevo sapere. Grazie!

Puoi guadagnare un sacco di soldi vendendo merci o schiavi attraverso il mare. Altri lo fanno per razziare gli insediamenti. Inoltre, nessun Viking ti rispeterà come un leader se non hai una buona nave.
Guarda il sole al giorno. Riposa durante la notte. Più bravo sei a trovare la strada, piu velocemente viaggi.

In primo luogo, è necessario sapere che tipo di nave ti serve. Se vuoi commerciare, una Knorr può essere una buona scelta. Hanno molto spazio per il carico, ma non sono molto veloci. Le Snekkja, le Skei e le Busse sono navi da guerra veloci e sono in grado di trasportare molte truppe. La Karvi è una via di mezzo. Se avete solo pochi uomini, va bene una piccola nave come la Byrding che forse è più utile.
Il secondo fattore importante è di che tipo di legno è fatta la nave. Navi in legno di quercia sono le navi migliori, ma sono anche costose. Il faggio è più conveniente, ma si rovina più velocemente.

Il vento -- se avete delle vele in grado di prenderlo meglio. Se non c'è vento, allora il tuo equipaggio deve remare. Più Vogatori renderà la nave più veloce. Se avete più di una nave nella flotta, la flotta viaggerà come la tua nave più lenta. Anche un navigatore esperto può rendere la tua flotta più veloce.
Voglio viaggiare verso un'altro porto.
Mi dispiace. Attualmente non ci sono navi passeggeri in questo porto che possano trasportare un Comandante e il suo esercito.
Mi dispiace. Non ci sono attualmente navi passeggeri in questo porto che possano trasportare il tuo gruppo e i commercianti con tutto il loro carico.
Da qui, si può viaggiare verso i porti di Friese, Danmark, Northvegr ed Englaland. Dove vuoi andare?
Da qui, si può viaggiare verso il porto di Englaland e di Eriuland. Dove vuoi andare?
Mi dispiace. Non ci sono attualmente navi passeggero in questo porto.
Ho cambiato idea.
Verso dove vuoi viaggiare a {s1}? {s2}
Iniziamo!
Seguimi!
La mia nave è pronta?
Io e miei uomini ci stiamo ancora lavorando su. Torna tra {reg1} giorni.
La nave è pronta! Vuoi che la attracchiamo?
Sì!
No, non ancora.
Siamo spiacenti, la tua abilità di re del mare non è sufficientemente alta per aggiungere un'ulteriore nave alla tua flotta in questo porto.
Beh, Guardatela e dategli un nome.
Non c'è abbastanza spazio nel porto per un'altra nave.
Voglio che mi costruisci una nave.
Che tipo di nave che vorresti avere?
Mi serve una Byrding.
Voglio una Knorr per commerciare.
Una  con un buon attacco, una Snekkja!
Sono interessato ad una nave da guerra di grandi dimensioni. Una Skeid, per favore.
Ho molti guerrieri. Puoi costruire un Busse per me?
Ho bisogno di una buona nave, versatile. Voglio una Karvi.
Ho cambiato idea.
Mi dispiace, non sono abbastanza esperto. Solo i Viking sono in grado di costruire una  {s11}.
Che tipo di legno vuoi usare?
Legno di quercia. Voglio la qualità.
Il Pino và bene.
Non voglio spendere tanto. Voglio il legno di frassino.
Ho cambiato idea.
Per costruire la tua {s11} di legno di {s12} voglio {reg11} peningas per il mio lavoro. {s2} Ci vorranno {reg12} giorni per costruire questa nave.
Costruisci questa nave per me!
Err, ti sembra che io sono un mercante? Non ho queste cose con me.
Mi dispiace, ma non riesco a finire la tua nave senza questi materiali. Comprali e ritorna quando hai tutto pronto.
In questo momento non ho abbastanza peningas.
Mi dispiace, ma ho bisogno di sfamare la mia famiglia e pagare i lavoratori. Quando avrai i soldi, puoi tornare da me.
Accetto quest'ordine e puoi tornare più tardi.
Prenditi il tuo tempo, ma fidati di me. Le mie navi valgono ogni penigans.
Molto bene! Torna tra {reg12} giorni.
Nulla, per ora. Addio.

{s2}^^Heill, {playername}. Vedo che ti sei fatto un nome in questa terra. Mi rende felice sapere che i miei affari ti hanno aiutato in questo. Meriterebbe una riga o due in una qualsiasi saga su di te! La flotta di Sven e Harald è dall'altra parte della baia. Conta cinquanta Navi, molte delle delle quali sono navi da guerra, per un totale di oltre 800 uomini. Hai finito il tuo affari in Danimarca? Sei pronto a Partire? Ti garantisco che non ci torneremo presto!
Sì, diamoci da fare. Facciamo salire a bordo i miei uomini.
Beh, buona fortuna Vinr. Anche se è possibile vedere molte navi da qui, la maggior parte della flotta è ancorato nella baia, fuori dalla città. Unisciti a loro, non appena vi sentite pronti!
No. Ho bisogno di finire alcune cose. Tornerò.
{s2}^^Well, give me the book, and I will tell you what you asked about.
Here, take it. Now, Sven's hideout?
Purtroppo, ho smarrito il libro. Volete dei soldi in cambio?
My client will not be happy, and people will know you're not reliable. My client would've paid me 10,000 peningas for the book. Do you have that kind of money?
I've got the money. Here, take it, and tell me where Sven is!
Sfortunatamente, no. Tornerò non appena lo avrò.
Oh my, you're a rich man! The hideout is here, in Danmark, southeast of Ribe, up the river. Far thu vel.
Grazie.
Well, thank you. The hideout is here, in Danmark, southeast of Ribe, up the river. Far thu vel.
Grazie.

{s2}^^Why so loud, friend? Nobody in port needs to know what we are talking about. I see someone has told you about me. That's fine. It's how businesses thrive.^^Well, you want to know the location. It is not hard to get, but it has a cost, of course, and not a cheap one. Bull Neck Sven is a dangerous man.

{s2}^^Listen carefully. Fortunately, I need someone like you. I need you to become, hmm, a 'raider' of sort, and go to Eriuland. I have a client who wants a book kept in a monastery there as a relic. The monastery is called Gleann Da Loch. The name of the book is the 'The Cathach of Colum Cille.' I am really only interested in the book. Anything else you take is yours. Bring me that book, and you will know where Sven Bull Neck is hiding.
Sounds good! I'll bring you the book. I will see you soon.
I neither plunder monasteries nor kill monks.
I prefer to forget about that book and offer peningas for the information.

Well, I'll be here. I suggest you repair and provision your ship. The trip to Eriuland is long. And bring enough men, for the Eriu war enough on each other to have become quite good at it. Far thu vel.

Then buy the book. I do not care how you get it. Just bring it. And I suggest you repair and provision your ship. The trip to Eriuland is long. And bring enough men, for the Godelic war enough on each other to have become quite good at it. Far thu vel.
Well, isn't that an interesting option? My client offers me 10,000 peningas for the book. Do you have that kind of money?
I've got the money. Take it, and tell me where Sven is hiding.
Unfortunately, not that kind of money. I'll bring the book. I will see you soon.
Oh, my, you're a rich man! The hideout is here, in Danmark, southeast of Ribe, up the river. Far thu vel.
Grazie.
{s2}^^Why do you always talk so loudly? Well, you know me, I'm a good source of information, but everything has a price.

{s2}^^Listen carefully. This info is especially valuable. We are talking about the number two man in Danmark, Sigurd 'Snake in the Eye.' How about 12,000 peningas? Do you have this kind of money? If not, perhaps you could do me a little favor instead. I have a client who needs to move some furs to Dubh Linn, in Eriuland. Why wouldn't you take the furs for me? In return, I will give you the information.
Well, deal. I will take the skins for you.
Oh, I've got the money. Here it is. Where is he now?
But we're old friends, man. For old business associates, would you not offer a discount?
Unfortunately, no. I'll return soon with the money.

Glad to hear that. Go to Dubh Linn and deliver the furs to a man named Hogni. He is the merchant there. You will find him easily. I would suggest carrying other goods, to sell in those distant lands. Once you return here with the receipt, you will get your information.
Then come back when you have the money. I have no time for beggars.

Aren't you a rich man! Well, Atli Eiriksson is in Northvegr. At least, that's what one of his men told a whore here. Apparently, Atli carries something important that needs to be hidden...for now. He is hiding in a cave on the north coast of Northvegr, near Hordaland. Far thu vel.
Grazie.
Hmm, well, just this one time, but do not tell anyone, I have my reputation to uphold. Eight thousand peningas, and this info is yours. Got the money?
Yes, I sure do. Take it. Where is he?
Unfortunately, no. I'll return soon with the money.

Well, but remember, no more discounts. Well, Atli Eiriksson is in Northvegr. At least, that's what one of his men told a whore here. Apparently, Atli carries something important that needs to be hidden...for now. He has gone to hide in a cave on the north coast of Northvegr, near Hordaland. Far thu vel.

I like doing business with you. Well, Atli Eiriksson is in Northvegr. At least, that's what one of his men told a whore here. Apparently, Atli carries something important that needs to be hidden...for now. He has gone to hide in a cave on the north coast of Northvegr, near Hordaland. Far thu vel.
Chi sei tu?
Are you looking for a slave trader? {s9} wouldn't prosper without my slaves, so if you have any prisoners of war, I'd be willing to buy them.
I've brought some prisoners.
Addio.
Nice to hear. Let's go.
È un piacere fare affari con Vostra Signoria.
Greetings. I'm a veteran captain who monitors activity at the port of {s9}. If you are interested in hiring unemployed sailors, let me know.
C'è qualcosa che posso fare per voi?
I want to recruit sailors.
There are no available sailors in the port at this time. Come back later, {reg59?madam:sir}.
I don't think anyone would be interested, {reg59?madam:sir}. You need to have more room in your party.
I can think of {reg5} who I suspect would jump at the chance if you could pay 40 peningas {reg7?each for their equipment:for his equipment}. Does that suit you?
Tell {reg7?them:him} to get ready.
No, non ora.
My name is {playername}...
Sorry, I'm busy preparing the boats and supplies for a fleet. If you do not need sailors, please leave me alone and come back later.
My name is {playername}. Aetheling Aelfred sent me.
My name is {playername}. Jarl Rathbarth send me.
^^Greetings, {playername}. I was notified about your arrival. You are in charge of a fleet bound for Frankia. There are men, guides and boats waiting for you to pick up.
Yes, the time has come. Douar-an-Enez awaits me.
I was told it would be weeks, even months out, so good luck. Your fleet is waiting for you at the exit of the port. Take your boat and go with them.
No. Ho bisogno di finire alcune cose. Tornerò.
I want to go. Farewell.

Why are you bothering me? I'm busy! I have no time for people like you. Come back another day. Or better yet, don't.^^       --It seems that Sigurd is not willing to receive you now. You'll need to look for another way to find out information about Sven.--
This is a good place away from prying ears. Now, talk.
This is a good place away from prying ears. Now, talk.
Heill, {playername}.

Heill, {playername}, vinr. Thanks to you, today we have won this battle! West Seaxe is now ours! But I guess you care more about Sven Bull Neck's location, right? Well, he got away, but not far. He has taken Readingum and has made a stronghold there, but my men have followed. I have put a hersir in my confidence, Arnvid, in charge of the mission. Meet him at Readingum. His men are at your disposal if you decide to assault the place.

Salve, {playername}! The Danish are on the run and have lost many jarls in this battle. Although there are still many of them left, we have achieved an important victory, and they will not be so bold in the future.^^I have some news for you. Sven Bull Neck has fled back to Readingum and has fortified himself in there. My men, led by a man named Eadric, have followed him. They will be at your disposal when you arrive. The moment is yours! Go to Readingum and settle your accounts with Sven Bull Neck.
Sorry, this is not a good time to talk.
Sorry, this is not a good time to talk.
Sorry, this is not a good time to talk.
Sorry, this is not a good time to talk.
Sorry, this is not a good time to talk.
What do you want? I do not have time for you! Get yourself a priest!
Mael Bresail wants to talk to you.
Sorry, this is not a good time to talk.
--You find your companion in his usual part of the camp.--
I'm busy right now, {playername}. We'll talk later.
{reg59?Lady:Sir}, everything is in order in the camp.

My {reg59?lady:lord}, sometimes I think, as we travel along the northern lands, what a dismal world we live in. I have read many books, but none of them talks about the violence and many dangers that we go through daily.

Well, I think the Danish are the hordes of Gog and Magog that will come at the last hour of the world and that the Kingdom of West Seaxe is the last human kingdom trying to fight the inevitable before the Second Coming.
Err...can you explain that Gog and Magog thing?
Very interesting, but I don't have time for this right now.

Oh, well, the Bible mentions Gog as a leader of the horde coming from the land of Magog in the far north. In Ezekiel's prophecy, Gog leads a great army of skilled warriors from many different nations. They will attack the nation of men chosen by God, and there will be a great battle that will affect the whole world. I think that this is what is happening now, with all these pagans advancing over Englaland.
We need to focus on the here and now. When the End comes, I assure you we won't miss it.
You worry too much, and I do not have time for this.
Yes, that's true. I tend to worry too much about things. I will enjoy the day.
{playername}, I like you, but sometimes I think you're too naive as a leader. Allow me to give you some advice.

I don't want to offend you, but I think you should take advantage of my experience. As you know, I grew up in the court of the king. I spend a lot of time in Ribe, where I meet the greatest warlords and their commanders.
I do not need your lessons.
Salve warlord, you should know that I'm from Eriu and descend directly from ancient warriors. Even my mother came from the old clan that the hero Cu Chulainn belonged to.

Eriu is divided into small clans that are grouped under the ones that are more powerful. These form kingdoms, for ages five in number. It is very important for each clan to show its power, and they often fight small wars. We mostly fight against neighboring clans, where rivalry tends to flourish, but many times larger clans lead others to wars between kingdoms, because the most important men of the island aspire to the throne of Tara. Being the master of Tara means you are the high king, Ard Ruire, of all Eriu, and that brings much glory for your clan.
So many rivalries make things easy for the Vikings.
So many wars produce very tough warriors.
Someone should unite all the clans.
I'm interested very little in this.

I admit that the Vikings have managed to become strong in some parts of the island, but they are as divided as we are. In fact, I dare say that they are already part of the way we do things in Eriu. It is not uncommon to see Vikings fighting alongside Goidels against other Vikings. The kings of Eriu have taken to hiring them as mercenaries, and Vikings often serve rival clans who face each other.

Yes, that's true. War eliminates the weakest and forces men to learn how fight. It is definitely a good place to get warriors for your army. On the other hand, if you let yourself be entangled by Goidelic politics or you try to become king of Tara, you will realize that the island has certain political traditions and that nothing you do will ever change Eriu.

All men and clans covet the throne of Tara, but really hardly anyone is capable of sitting in it. Those who try tend to have short lives, but always another man and another clan come along, and the cycle continues. If the throne of Tara is ever yours, may you enjoy it as long as possible. Your clan will be famous and respected, but your life will be very short.
Surely, Eriu, or Hibernia, as the Romans called it, is a different land. Forget everything you know, Eriu is different!

Every time I give an order in your name, Dwywei questions my authority among your men. Now she is gathering with some warriors to mutter against me. I do not understand this hate, as we both are from the same kingdom.

The Scots of Dal Riata are bloody traitors. They came from Eriu to take our western lands. Some years ago, we lost our beloved king Bridei fighting against the Norsemen, and most of the Pictish nobility died with him. Then Cinaed mac Ailpin, the king of Dal Riata, disputed the Pictish crown with the surviving members of the seven royal houses of the Picts.

-- She grits her teeth --^^Cinaed defeated us in battle and later met all claimants to the Pictish crown at Scone. They feasted while mead and ale flowed freely. What happened next is known as Mac Ailpin's treason: 'the Conqueror' killed all our nobles and became the only claimant for the Pictish Crown. Now his successor, the king of Alban, rules over both the Picts and the Scots. Who can trust in this traitor's race? Me? No!
Stupid and stubborn Picts...
Forget this old enmity. Now you have a common enemy. Together you must face the Norsemen.
I understand your concern about the Scots, but Donnachdh has proven to be a man of honor.
Is this how Scots are? Then I hate them, too. Dirty traitors!
As you wish.
I understand that Donnachdh is not guilty of what happened. I'll try being nicer to him.
I hope, for your sake, that you are kidding, but I don't find you so funny.

{reg59?My lady:Sir}, in Cornubia men with guts are a dying breed. In the past, we were a proud people, and our holdings stretched across southern Britannia. Then the Saxons came, and we lost the land.
Now the sea brings the Danish, as previously it did the Angles and the Saxons. Now, the Saxons fear losing this land they took from us to the Danish. Isn't fate ironic?
Sure, but don't bother me about Saxons. They will lose what they stole.
The Saxons are strong. They will resist the Danish.
I have very little interest in this.
It is possible. Maybe God has a sense of humor or our prayers have brought the Danish to punish the Saxons. But who cares? Britannia is lost to the Britons.

You mean we were weak? I think not! It is true that we were disunited and unlucky with our kings, but Arthur showed that it was possible to defeat the Saxons. We can only regret that there was no one to pick up his legacy. Britannia is now lost for us.
Britannia will be returned to the Britons. I swear I will do it.
Forget the past and focus on the present.
I appreciate your words, but both of us know that, even if you conquer the whole island, Britannia of today has nothing in common with Britannia of yore. It will not be the same.
Yes, you're right. There is little sense in mourning the past. Let us return to the present.

{playername}, my parents were important people in Pictland, and their grandparents before them, and all my ancestors. They were descendants on the maternal side -- the one that matters to Picts -- of royal blood.

However, there have been many changes in the kingdom known as Alban. Our people are mixing with our old enemies, the Goidels of Dal Riata, and my family was disgraced. I tried to recover our prestige as a warrior, but since the Picts embraced Christ, women have been excluded from this profession more and more each day. Ultimately, I failed, and my family paid with their lives for my failure.

I do not normally talk about this, but I would like to say I have found a new family while traveling with you. This helps me to ease the burden of my past. For years, I hated the current kings of Alban. Now I don't care any more. My failure and the new laws of our land brought about the end of my family. I just pray that you don't judge me harshly for my past.
What happened is in the past. You are very important to me.
Thanks for sharing your story with me. I'm glad you found peace with yourself.
You caused the death of your family, and you do not want to be judged harshly? Nonsense!
--She looks down shyly--^^You are also very important to me. Oh, well, I have things to do.
Thank you for your understanding.
{playername}, although you see me fight hard in battles, mark my body with war paint, and scream while I stab our enemies...
You know I'm a shy person, right?
I did not know that.
Yes, I know.
I have little time now to hear about this. We'll talk later.
Oh, I see. Well, well, I... we'll talk another day...
What I mean is that I can say things, but I want you to know that I admire and appreciate you very much. Well, I do not want to talk more about this. It is cumbersome. We'll talk another day.
I need to talk to you, {playername}. It is a very serious issue for me, but I will raise it only once.
You know I'm interested in you, appreciate you and like you. I think you feel the same way when you look at me, but I'm not sure. Can it be...?
Yes, Dwywei, I like you a lot.
Sorry, but I'm not interested in you.
I am happy to hear you say that! I guess this means we're together, yes?
I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I feel embarrassed. I thought... I was wrong. Sorry, I will not bother you any more. Now, I have things to do.
Yes, Dwywei, you are my woman now.
No. It was just a joke. I'm not interested in you at all.
I am so happy! I love you. I am going to put my things in your tent!
A joke? You're a jerk! What kind of person kids about things like that? Leave me alone. I do not want to see you any more.
My friend, some of your men are muttering because the food is disgusting. Do you want their names?
I really appreciate your concern, Reginhard.
Well, err... I know you are a generous man. I'm sure you will reward my fidelity someway... You know what I mean, right?
Sure. Take this money and keep me informed.
Shut up, you greedy scum. Don't try to cheat me again.
I always reward every man as he deserves. Don't forget that.
It won't be necessary. Tomorrow the food will be better.
Warlord, I think it's necessary to train our men more. Haven't you read Vegetius? The ancients knew how to convert simple farmers into great soldiers in just a few days.
I can force them to practice harder. Trust me. You will see how I transform them into veteran warriors.
Alright, let them sweat, but I want good results. Take these 1000 peningas to reward the best.
That is a good idea. I appoint you weapon master.
They are tired; I don't want to force them... for now. But I appreciate your offer.

I want to tell you something important. A war band has to be led by a man of honor, but these times are too hard for mercy. The warriors need a strong leader, someone able to make hard decisions when they are needed.
--You realize some of your men hear the conversation--^^Only a fool can consider mercifulness as weakness.
Just so, but fear converts men into fools. Don't be weak, {playername}. They smell fear, like dogs.
I appreciate your concern, but I know how to manage my people.
Maybe you are right, my friend. I will follow your advice.
I have reconsidered my opinion about Brunhild. Maybe she can be a good warrior after all. Do you know why?
Sto ascoltando.
Because she can bleed for a week and not die! Ha, ha, ha... Seriously, is she really necessary here? Her constant gossiping gives me headaches.
Seriously, you give me headaches. Yet I keep you...
If you are not comfortable here, you are free to go.
Maybe a war band is not a good place for her. I'll think about it.
In your army, I visit so many places and meet so many people. I didn't realize the world was so big!

Honestly, my family and I lived in the cave all this time, only going to the Wall to sell goods. Once I visited Bebbanburh, and I thought that was the greatest and most wonderful place. That was nothing compared to the places you take me now.
And there are still many more places for you to visit.
Why are you bothering me with this?
I'm sure there are plenty of places to visit. I can only say that joining you was the best decision of my life. I will never return to the cave of my parents.
Ah, excuse me, sorry. I understand that for someone like you, this is very trivial, but for me it's so new. I will not bother you with my silly talk any longer. Farewell.
I want to ask to you about...
Caio is the stupidest man I have ever met. He is always asking about the most basic things. He knows nothing about tactics, and his ignorance puts all of us in danger.
Excuse me if I have offended you. I just wanted to know what a cuenus is.
--He is angrier and begins to speak louder--^^Don't you know?
You have to be patient with Caio. He is a valuable man and learns fast.
Caio, if you don't come up to scratch soon, you should consider leaving us.
Don't bother me with this foolishness again.
Thank you for your confidence.
I... understand.
Sometimes when I sleep, I dream of my past life in Doccinga and Kennemer. These nightmares remind me of my time of servitude.

I am glad that I have left all that behind. In fact, I hate Friese, and treading its soil brings back dark memories. When we visit Friese on our travels, I only ask you to have patience with me. I will spend most of the time in my tent when we are not walking or fighting, sulking and not wanting to talk to anyone.
Now, forgive me, but just talking about it has upset my stomach. I think all these memories make me so depressed that I may never fully heal.

--You note that he is impatient, nervous.--^^Hi {playername}. We've been traveling together for a while, and our friendship, at least for me, is sincere. In fact, I have not trusted anyone like this for years.

Actually, I'm surprised that our relationship is so good. My life has not been easy, especially here in the north, and I find it hard to trust people, but you're winning my trust so easily, it scares me.
It's good to trust others, Bodo.
That has happened to me as well.
Keep your distance. You're just a soldier to me.
Yes, you're right. I should trust myself more. Friendship is normal, not a dangerous shackle. Thanks my friend!
You feel it, too? You see? We are suspicious people, too used to danger and to being deceived. I'll think about it! Thanks for your time.
Yes, sorry. I was confused, but you've certainly cleared it up for me.
{playername}, we have to talk! It is complicated. I do not know how to say this, but it needs to be said.

Let me be clear, I've noticed how you look at me, and I fear that you're falling for me. I completely understand. I am an attractive man with warrior skills and leadership, but I must warn you that I am a married. I have a woman there in Cantabria and sixteen children.
I think you should stop experimenting with mushrooms, Bodo. I have no interest in you.
It's true. I really like you.
Keep your distance, sir. You're a lowly soldier! I hardly even notice your presence.
Are you sure? That surprises me, I'm a real man, really macho, who attracts a lot of women. Well, luckily, now I can breathe easier.
That worries me. You're an attractive woman, but you must know that I'm a married man and I owe it to my wife. I must make it clear that nothing will ever happen between us.
Yes, sorry. I was confused, but you've certainly cleared it up for me.
I was joking. I do not really like you. You're an ugly pig.
Do not worry. From now on, our relationship will strictly be that of warlord and soldier.
No problem, but I will keep your name on my wish list.

For the first time in my life, I feel like I am in a real army. Being a warrior and being beautiful have never made it easy for me to be part of a large group of men, but here you know how to maintain order, and people respect me.

The Danish and Norwegians, and the world in general, do not have a good opinion of a woman who leaves home armed and ready to fight. Exactly for this reason, the skjaldmo are more legend than reality. There are very few like me, and soon there will be none, believe me.
In my army, we do not distinguish between men and women, only between good and bad warriors.
You will always be well treated here.
Woman, your place is at home with a husband.
I know, and I like it here. You must know that you have a loyal follower in me. I am committed to your cause.
Thanks, {playername}. I hope to stay with you for a long time.
I am confused. On the one hand, you accept me in your army, but on the other hand, you say I should get married and go home. You must be joking. Hah! Good one on old Solveig.
{playername}, I like you a lot. I must admit that I am drawn to you.

As you know, I chose the path of war. I keep my virginity in order to protect myself from love and men. It is not an easy way; it's not a comfortable way, but it has its laws, and if I break these, my life will become meaningless. My arms are my only husbands, and my shield is my home. I need you to respect that or I'll have to leave your company.
I respect that, Solveig, and I am not really attracted to you.
Sorry, Solveig, but I'm in love with you.
Well, part of me regrets that my feelings are not reciprocated, but the other part is happy to continue serving under your banner. I need to analyze these feelings. Good luck, friend.

I understand. We love each other, but we can't be together. If I give in to this, I will end up locked away on a farm looking after 10 kids, and I could not bear that. I was born to be free and live an intense life. I want to enjoy the same freedoms as a man. I think it would be the best if I leave.
Don't leave, Solveig. We will never discuss this again, and I shall restrain myself.
Yes, it is best that you leave.
I also want to stay. Let's not talk about it and keep our distance. From now on, I will put my tent as far away from yours as possible. Farewell.
Yes, I think that is most appropriate. Good luck, friend. May the fates accept you.

It's interesting how Christian priests speak about the end of the world. It is very similar to what the Danish think. In both cases, we do not know when it will come, but we're sure it will. In both cases, it will be a catastrophe of epic proportions and of huge armies fighting in a devastated world.

But they think differently about other things. For the Danish, a large tree, called Yggdrasil, holds the nine worlds. The principal world is Asgard, where the gods live and which is governed by Odin and his wife Frigg. It can only be reached by the Rainbow Bridge, named Bifrost and guarded by Heimdal.
Dimmi di più.
Very interesting, but I have no time to listen. Farewell.

Another world is the ice land of Jotunheim, where a giant lives, banished there by our gods, the Aesir. There are also Alfheim, home of the elves, and Svartalfaheim, inhabited by dark elves and dwarves. We are in Midgard, the Middle Earth, inhabited by men. Below is the dark world of Niflheim, inhabited by the dragon Nidhogg, who has been gnawing at the roots of Yggdrasil from the beginning of time. Someday the roots will all be eaten and Yggdrasil will fall, starting Ragnarok.
Dimmi di più.
Very interesting, but I have no time to listen. Farewell.

At the end of time, Loki, his monsters and the dead will advance on the other worlds. Heimdall will sound his horn from the Rainbow Bridge, and gods and men will tremble with fear, for they will know that their time has come. A battle of gigantic proportions, the Ragnarok, will occur in which the gods and men will clash against the hosts of evil. The gods will lose, because it is well predicted, and their world will be destroyed by chaos. Odin will be swallowed up by the wolf Fenrir.
Well, {playername}, I guess it's not a very promising fate, but it teaches us that, no matter what we do, we are doomed. Therefore, it is best to enjoy each new day thoroughly.
Fate is inexorable, Asbjorn.
I make my own destiny, Asbjorn.

{playername}, as you know, a long time ago I was in the land of Rus in the east. I travelled all through the far lands of the Slavs. I had good boots and became rich, until fate twisted things and brought me west.

What I didn't tell you is that I suffered for love. I fell in love with the wife of a jarl, and she fell in love with me. We kept our love a secret, but someone betrayed us. The jarl killed his wife and put a price on my head, but I did not flee...
Sto ascoltando.
No more talking. You have to keep your hands off other people's wives.

I painted my face black and dressed in dark clothes. That night, I broke into his farm and killed him in his sleep. Then I fled to the west, where nobody knew me. Although everything I told you before was true, this is the real reason I'm here with you today. However, I have discovered that you are a great leader that I like to follow.
Thank you for your honesty.
Nice story, but you have to keep your hands off other people's wives.
After the death of Helgi, the woman I was in love with, I thought it was impossible to fall in love again, {playername}.
I think the old wound has finally healed, and I'm ready for a new relationship.
I am happy to hear that.
Well, we will see if your fight better in the shield wall now.
I'm glad to hear that you are happy about it.
I need to talk, {playername}. It is a very serious issue for me, but I will only raise it once.
You know, I'm interested in you, appreciate you and like you. I think you feel the same way when you look at me, but I'm not sure.
Yes, Helgi, I like you a lot.
Sorry, but I'm not interested in you.
I am happy to hear you say that! After Helgi's death, I did not think I could fall in love again, but here we are. I think we will be fine.
I'm sorry! I'm sorry! I feel embarrassed. I thought... I was wrong. Sorry, I will not bother you any more about this. I have better things to do.
Yes, we can be together, but please stop mentioning Helgi.
No. It was just a joke. I'm not interested in you at all.
I am so happy. I love you. Let me go and move my things to your tent!
Save your stupid jokes for yourself, you bitch! Get lost!

Salve {playername}! My friend and I were just talking about you. We were discussing whether you're just a warlord or if you have ambitions of being Brytenwalda. Oh, sorry to be rude. Here, please meet Heraclio.
--Agathinos changes his voice, making it sharp--^^Salve {playername}, I am Heraclio from Nicea.
Agathinos, what does this mean?
Salve Heraclio.
Have you been eating mushrooms again? Maybe you need some sleep.

Heraclio is spending a few days with us before returning to Nicea. I haven't seen him for a very long time -- not since those painful, torturous days as slaves of the Norwegians. He will leave soon, but he wanted to meet you before he goes.
It's high time I finally met you, Heraclio.
I have no time for this. Farewell.

--Agathinos changes his voice, making it sharp--^^My brother from another mother, the illustrious engineer Agathinos, has told me a lot about you. He thinks you'll be Brytenwalda, but I think that you're just a warlord.
Agathinos is right. I will be Brytenwalda someday.
You are right. I am simply a man of war.
--Before your eyes, Agathinos starts arguing with himself, changing his voice and without paying much attention to you.--

Are you serious, Egil? Did you really make out with a camp follower? I thought you were different and that you really cared about us, but now I see I was wrong. You are just a bastard in every meaning.

Brunhild, Honey, you are just a slave and I'm the son of the king. Our story can't be real. We were just having fun, nothing else. I thought you knew that. You would have to be an idiot to think you can have a king's son just like that. You will always be my favourite, but I have and I will always have my good times with others... Who knows? Maybe someday I will find a lady to marry.
Calm down!
(Say nothing)

Do you really think that? You are not so superior to me. Your father might be a king, but your mother was nothing but a slave, like me. You will never get anyone better than me, and you will lose me if your attitude doesn't change.

I don't need to be officially recognised as an heir. Everyone knows that I'm the son of the king of Danmark. Every single lady in the kingdom sighs for me. Don't get me wrong, I love you and I really like what we have, but I can have so much more.
...^^--Nothing to do here. You run while you can.--

You people think that strong arms can win any battle, but it's not always the case. A good formation or a smart strategy is much more important than bold warriors. Even in a duel, the strength of a soldier is not the key factor that makes him win or lose.

That is what you weak people always think, and that's why we, the bravest soldiers of all Svia, or even just simple Danes, pillage your lands. If you spent more time training and becoming good warriors instead of dancing around one another, you would have a real kingdom instead of those tiny lands you have in Frankia... for now.

Try to come openly, without any surprises, and we'll see what happens. I swear that your undisciplined men will fall in a few moments and that none of you would survive, because you don't know when one needs to retreat.
Ha! Cowards! We prefer to be brave and dead instead of being shamed as losers. Victory or death!
Frankia makes better warriors than Svia.
Svia makes better warriors than Frankia.
I think you both are wrong. A good army needs both strict discipline and strong warriors.
Ha! The Warlord thinks like me.
I'll spare further words.
Exactly. Ha!
Who was asking? I thought this was a private discussion.
--Agathinos stares with great interest at one of the women from the camp...--
--...Brunhild.--
--Spits on the ground.--^^The Greeks are lustful people.
What makes you think so?

Even your priests live in sin. The Council of Elvira forbade clerics to cohabit with their wives. Otherwise, how can they celebrate the daily Eucharist? If they yield to the temptation of the flesh, what you can expect from their flock?
Do not confuse celibacy with continence. The Council of Elvira did not forbid marriage to the clergy, just the sharing of a bed before sacred offices.
Sex is a carnal act. That takes us away from the path of Christ. Virginity is an obligation for any true man of God. Am I not right, {playername}?
I agree with you, Bede. These people have to be perverts.
And what's wrong with sex? I know priests with more children than Noah.
I don't want to get involved. This is an argument between you and Agathinos.
Well said. You step fully and still in the kingdom of heaven.
Ha! That was good!
Why do I even bother? I'm surrounded by lust.
I asked you because I thought you were a brave man and not a coward who evades a straight answer. Farewell.
I have sent a notice of your arrival to the sons of Ragnar. You are bold to come through all these Mercians. Who sent you?

Emissary of the Danish, I present you to Aelfred of West Seaxe, son of Aethelwulf, Aetheling, Ealdorman, God loved, and brother of and designated successor to the great Athelred, king of West Seaxe and Brytenwalda. Bow to someone who is above you.
Sorry, this is not a good time to talk. The leaders are up in the center of the village.
I am keeping watch.
I am keeping watch.
I am keeping watch.
I am keeping watch.
I am just a servant. You must talk to Ulf, my {reg59?lady:lord}.
I wish to defer the appointment of a lord until I take the counsel of my subjects there.
I wish to defer the appointment of a lord until I have finished... determining its value.
As you wish, {reg59?my lady:my lord}. You may decide this matter at a later date.
My idea is just to sack the place and leave.
My idea is to devastate the place completely and leave.
As you wish, {reg59?my lady:my lord}.
As you wish, {reg59?my lady:my lord}. {reg6?I:{reg7?You:{s11}}} will be the new {reg3?lady:lord} of {s1}.
{s1} non è controllato da nessuno. A chi darlo in custodia?
Vi prego {s65}, vorrei tenere {s1} per me. (feudi: {s0})
{s66}, potreste avere in custodia {s1}. (feudi: {s0})
Hmmm. Così sia, {playername}. Ho valutato il vostro consiglio. {reg6?Io sarò:{reg7?Voi sarete:{s11}}} {reg3?la nuova signora:il nuovo signore} di {s1}.

Hello there. We are polishing off our combat skills here with a bit of sparring practice. You look like you could use a bit of training. Why don't you join us, and we can show you a few tricks. If you need explanation of any combat concepts, just ask, and I will do my best to fill you in.
In cosa volete fare pratica?
Ditemi, in cosa volete addestrarvi?
Voglio addestrarmi nelle tecniche d'attacco.
Voglio addestrarmi nelle parate all'arma bianca.
Voglio fare un po' di pratica di combattimento.
[Abbandona]

All right. There are four principle directions for attacking. These are overhead swing, right swing, left swing and thrust. Now, I will tell you which direction to attack from and you must try to do the correct attack.^^(Move your mouse while you press the left mouse button to specify attack direction. For example, to execute an overhead attack, move the mouse up at the instant you press the left mouse button. The icons on your screen will help you do the correct action.)
Cominciamo allora. Posso iniziare.
Actually, I want to do something else.

Unlike a shield, blocking with a weapon can only stop attacks coming from one direction. For example if you block up, you'll deflect overhead attacks, but you can still be hit by side swings or thrust attacks.^^(You must press and hold down the right mouse button to block.)

I'll now attack you with different types of strokes, and I will wait until you do the correct block before attacking. Try to do the correct block as soon as you can.^^(This practice is easy to do with the 'automatic block direction' setting, which is the default. If you go to the Options menu and change the defend direction control to 'mouse movement' or 'keyboard,' you'll need to manually choose block direction. This is much more challenging, but makes the game much more interesting. This practice can be very useful if you use manual blocking.)
Cominciamo allora. Posso iniziare.
Actually, I want to do something else.

La simulazione di combattimento è un ottimo modo per prepararsi al combattimento reale. Combatteremo tra noi con armi non letali, fino a quando uno dei due cade a terra. Potrete farvi qualche livido, ma è sempre meglio che avere la peggio in uno scontro reale.

La simulazione di combattimento è un ottimo modo per prepararsi al combattimento reale. Combatteremo tra noi con armi non letali, fino a quando uno dei due cade a terra. Potrete farvi qualche livido, ma è sempre meglio che avere la peggio in uno scontro reale.
Cominciamo allora. Posso iniziare.
Cominciamo allora. Posso iniziare.
Good luck.
Actually, I want to do something else.
Actually, I want to do something else.

Bene. Avete mostrato abilità nel bloccare i miei attacchi. Dovete ripetere quest'addestramento e provare a diventare sempre più veloce, fino a quando non acquisirete confidenza con le vostre abiltà difensive. Volete addestrarvi ancora?
Non è andata molto bene, concordate? Volete provare di nuovo? (Ricorda, devi cliccare e tenere premuto il tasto destro del mouse per rendere la parata effettiva.)
Si. Proviamo ancora.
No, basta per adesso.
Hey! We are practicing blocking, mate! You are supposed to block my attacks, not attack me back.
Scusatemi. Proviamo di nuovo.
Spiacente. Ora devo smettere.
Bene. Come desiderate.
Non è andata molto bene, concordate? Non preoccupatevi, e provate a non commettere gli stessi errori la prossima volta. Volete continuare ad addestrarvi?
Sì. Tentiamo nuovamente.
No. È abbastanza per me.
Va bene. Tornate da me se cambiate idea.
Hey, è stato uno scontro valido. Mi avete sconfitto, la prossima volta però farò più attenzione. Volete fare un altro giro?
Very good. You have learned how to attack from any direction you want. If you like, we can try this again or move to a different exercise.

Not bad. Not bad at all! You seem to have grasped the basics of archery. Now, try to do the same thing with a sling. Take the sling and the sling rocks over there and shoot those three targets. The sling is much easier to use with compared with the bow, but you need to reload it after each shot.
Good. You didn't have too much difficulty using the sling either. Next, you will learn to use throwing weapons. Pick up the javelins you see over there and try to hit those three targets.
Train every day, and in time, you will be as good as the best marksmen.
You can go talk with the melee fighters or the horsemanship trainer if you haven't already done so. They can teach you important skills too.
Well, with that you have received the basic skills to use all three types of ranged weapons. The rest will come with practice. Train every day, and in time, you will be as good as the best marksmen.
Now you can go talk with the melee fighters or the horsemanship trainer if you haven't already done so. They can teach you important skills too.

Good day to you, young fellow. I spend my days training the men of the jarl of Kennemer in the art of archery. If you need a bow and javelins to practice, let me know, and I'll rent them to you both for 10 peningas.
Yes, I wish to practice my archery with your men (pay 10 peningas).
No, non ora.
Nice to do business with you.

Good day to you, young fellow. I spend my days teaching about ranged weapons to anyone that is willing to learn. If you need a tutor, let me know and I'll teach you how to use the bow, the sling and the javelin.
Si, mostratemi come usare le armi da lancio.
No, non ora.

All right. Your first training will be in archery. The bow is a difficult weapon to master, but once you are sufficiently good at it, you will be able to shoot quickly and with great power. Go pick up the bow and arrows you see over there now and shoot those targets.
All right, I am ready.
Wait just a moment. I want to do something else first.
Spero che vi piaccia cavalcare. Ora passiamo a qualcosa di un po' più difficile. Afferrate la lancia che vedete là sopra e cavalcate lungo il percorso colpendo i bersagli allo stesso tempo.

Good! You have been able to hit all targets on horseback. That's no easy feat for a starter. Your next challenge will be using a bow and arrows to shoot at the archery targets by the road. You need to put an arrow to each target to consider yourself successful.
You were good. Keep riding and practicing each day, and in time, you will be an expert horseman.
Now, you can go talk with the melee fighters or the archery trainer, if you haven't already done so. You need to learn everything you can to be prepared when you have to defend yourself.
Keep riding and practicing each day, and in time, you will be an expert horseman.
You can also go talk with the melee fighters or the archery trainer, if you haven't already done so. You need to learn everything you can to be prepared when you have to defend yourself.

Good day! I have come here for some riding practice, but my old bones are aching badly, so I decided to give myself a rest today. If you would like to practice your horsemanship, you can take my horse here. The exercise would be good for her.
Yes, thank you for lending me your horse.
No, non ora.
No problem. Good luck.

Buongiorno. Sono arrivato qui per fare della pratica d'equitazione, ma le mie vecchie ossa sono doloranti, così ho deciso per oggi di riposarmi. Se volete migliorare le vostre capacità nel cavalcare, potete prendere il mio cavallo. L'esercizio farà bene anche a lui.
Si, voglio fare pratica d'equitazione.
Um, maybe later.

Bene. Ora farete qualche esercizio che v'insegnerà a cavalcare e ad usare armi a cavallo. Il vostro primo compito è semplice. Prendete il cavallo per un giro intorno al circuito. Andate lentamente o velocemente, come preferite. Tornate quando avrete preso confidenza con l'uso del cavallo e vi darò altri esercizi da fare.
All right, I am ready.
Just a moment. I need to do something else first.
Hey, I am trying to practice here. Go and talk with the archery trainer if you need guidance about ranged weapons.
C'è un cambiamento nei piani?
Che sta succedendo?
Che sta succedendo?
Sono venuto a portarvi fuori da qui.
You are free to rejoin my party, friend.
Grazie al cielo siete qui! Tuttavia non posso andare da nessuna parte con queste catene alle gambe. Dovrete trovare un modo per portar via le chiavi alla guardia.
Thank the heavens you came! Let me get my things collected, and I will rejoin you as soon as I can.
Che state guardando?
State guardando me?
Un tale spreco...
Meglio lui di me
Non so con certezza... Qualche tipo di animale, chiaramente.
Excuse me. Please accept my apologies
Cancellerò quel sorriso dalla vostra faccia!
Avete idea di chi io sia?
Mi dovrebbe importare?
Emmm... Actually... Yes, yes, I do know who you are, my {reg59?lady:lord}. Please forgive me, your grace -- it must be the drink. I'll be leaving, now...
Perché... Se volete uno scontro, l'avrete!
I thought as much. Now, remove yourself from here.
You look like a {reg59?lady:fellow} who can take a few hard knocks -- and deal them out, too. I have a business proposition for you.
Di che si tratta?
Bene, sono contento che v'interessi. Ecco il piano... È un po' complicato, quindi ascoltate attentamente...

You and this other fellow will start up a fight here. No weapons, no armor -- I'll sit back and take bets, and split the profits with the winner. If we make a loss, then I'll cover it. You have nothing to lose -- except a bit of blood, of course.

However, we can't organize this like one of those nice arena bouts, where everyone places their bets beforehand. People will walk in, drawn by the noise, and put a pening or two on whichever one of your two they think is winning. I'll give 'em even odds -- anything else is going to be too tricky for someone who's already on his third flagon of ale.

So, as you can see, the trick is to stretch things out for as long as possible where it looks like you're losing, and people bet against you -- and then come back fast, and win, before the betting can turn. The best way to make money is for you to be battered almost to the floor, and then jump back off your feet and take your opponent down. However, you have to win in the end, in order for me, and you, to make money.

Moreover, you can't stretch the fight out too long, or people will suspect a fix. So, one of you has to take a punch every so often. I don't care whose blood is spilled, but there has to be some blood.
One more thing. My mate, your opponent, doesn't take to well to complexity, so he's just going to come straight at you. It's up to you to supply the artistry.
Allora, che ne pensate?
Ho cose migliori da fare.
Good day to you, {reg59?lassie:young man}.
Forgive me. You look like a trader, but I see no merchandise.
Niente.

Un Mercante? Oh, certo, io lo sono di sicuro. La mia mercanzia è differente da quella comune, comunque. Dev'essere alimentata e abbeverata due volte al giorno e cerca di scappare se gli volgo la schiena.
Merce viva?

Non siete distante dal vero. Mi piace chiamarmi 'l'uomo che tiene ogni barca su questo oceano in movimento'. Le barche sono guidate da remi, come sapete, ed i remi hanno bisogno di uomini per muoverle o arrestarle. Ecco dove arrivo io.
Schiavi per galee...
Ecco! Un porto commerciale non può sopravvivere senza di loro. Le galee perdono molte braccia in ogni viaggio, così c'è sempre un'alta richiesta. I capitani vengono da me e mi pagano bene.
Da dove vengono gli schiavi?

Mostly I deal in convicted criminals bought from the authorities. Others are prisoners of war from various nations, or people unable to pay their debts, brought to me because I offer the best prices. However, on occasion I'll buy from privateers and other... 'individuals.' You can't be picky about your suppliers in this line of work. You wouldn't happen to have any prisoners with you, would you?
Io?

Why not? If you intend to set foot outside this town, you're going to cross swords with someone sooner or later. And, God willing, you'll come out on top. Why not make some extra money off the whole thing? Take them alive, bring them back to me, and I'll pay you fifty peningas for each head. Don't much care who they are or where they come from.
Hmm. Ci Penserò.
Pensateci! Ci sono un sacco di soldi da fare, senza fallo. Molti! Sia per me che per voi.
Salve, {playername}.
Nient'altro?
I've brought you some prisoners. Would you like a look?
Vediamo cos'avete...
È un piacere fare affari con Vostra Signoria.
Come posso prendere prigionieri?
Mi potete dire come catturare alcuni prigionieri?

You're new to this, aren't you? Let me explain it in simple terms. The basic rule of taking someone prisoner is knocking him down with a blunt weapon, like a mace or a club, rather than cutting him open with a sword. That way he goes to sleep for a little while rather than bleeding to death, you see? I'm assuming you have a blunt weapon with you...
Certo.
Purtroppo no...

Bene, in termini più crudi l'unica cosa da fare è schiacciare questi insetti, e quando la battaglia è vinta potrete metterli in manette. È leggermente differente per nobili e comandanti: grazie alla loro abilità e alla pesante protezione che indossano rimarranno in vita anche se li colpirete con armi perforanti o da taglio.

No? Heh, well, this must be your lucky day. I have an old club lying around that I was going to throw away. It's a bit battered, but still good enough to bash someone until he stops moving. Here, have it.
Thanks, man. Perhaps I may try my hand at it.

Alright, I'll try and explain it again in simple terms. The basic rule of taking someone prisoner is knocking him down with a blunt weapon, like a mace or a club, rather than cutting him open with a sword. That way he goes to sleep for a little while rather than bleeding to death, you see? It's a bit different for nobles and such, they tend to be protected enough that it won't matter what kind of weapon you use, but your average rabble-rouser will bleed like a stuck pig if you get him with something sharp.
Ok, penso di aver capito. Qualcos'altro?

Beh, tenete conto che non è una cosa semplice da fare. Le armi contundenti non fanno gli stessi danni di quelle taglienti, così non tireranno giù i nemici con la stessa velocità. E fidatevi, molte carogne che incontrerete vorranno uccidervi appena vi vedranno, quindi non aspettatevi alcuna cortesia particolare estraendo una clava anzichè una spada. Oltretutto, avendo dei prigionieri con vossignoria, rallenterete il vostro viaggiare, ecco perché alcuni liberano i prigionieri dopo che la battaglia ha avuto termine. È follia! Come può una persona gettare tutto quel denaro, eh?
Are you done?

Giusto un'ultima cosa. Controllare i prigionieri con sicurezza non è una cosa semplice da fare, si può dire che è una capacità a sè stante. Se volete catturare molti prigionieri, dovete provare ed imparare per conto vostro, o non potrete portare nemmeno un uomo presso di voi.
Grazie, lo terrò a mente.
Is there anything else I can do with my prisoners?

If you are so inclined, you can interrogate your prisoners while camping, and offer them a chance to join your army. That of course will lower the morale of your army, and some prisoners will agree to join you just to run away back to their families. If you have a figure of authority among your prisoners, such as a Bandit Leader you can ask him to form a band out of your prisoners (you must have more than 50), and send them to raid one of your enemy's villages, or attack them directly in exchange for freedom. But the best way is always for you to sell your prisoners to me.
È meglio che vada.
Ricordate, ogni prigioniero che avete, portatelo da me. Vi pagherò per ognuno di loro.
I humbly request that your lordship keep his hands where I can see them.
No problem.
Can you tell me what it takes to convince your lady to marry me?
I would gladly tell your lordship, if he finds 25 peningas in his pock..., purse.
Don't think I want to pay you.
Here you are. Now, speak!

Thank you, your lordship. To be considered as a potential groom, you have to be a person of stature, a pledged vassal or a renowned warrior. At the very least, you should have as much renown as junior lords. Secondly, you must have good relations with the lady, and her father or guardian. Lastly, the most important component is chemistry. The chemistry between you and the lady will largely depend on your charisma, so being ugly, fat, or having a cheap beer or pickle breath would hardly come handy. If you get refused the first time, don't despair, their ladyships are known for playing hard to get, wait a few days and try again. With high persuasion, and charisma, you will eventually prevail, and the lady will agree to get married. Then go and talk to her father or guardian, and get an official blessing from him.
We have not come to talk, {reg59?girlie:mate}. It's time for swords.
Hey, you there! Have you seen any outlaws around here?
Yes, they went this way some time ago.
I knew it! Come on, lads! Let's go get these bastards! Thanks a lot, friend.
No, non ho visto alcun criminale.
Bah. They're holed up in this country like rats, but we'll smoke them out sooner or later.
I wish to collect on the bounties of some criminals I have captured.
There's your bounty. Now me and the lads are going to hunt down more criminals.
You scum pillage and enslave people. You deserve death.
How dare you! Prepare to die.
Good luck. Farewell.
Addio.
Non ho paura di voi. Combattete se non avete timore!
Non avrete niente da me a parte del freddo metallo, feccia!
Do you have any idea whom you are talking to? I will not kill you if you join me.
I care very little who you are. It is time for you to die.
Yes, I've heard of you. They say the men of your party enjoy the best loot. Forgive us, and we will be delighted to join such a fierce leader.
Yes, I've heard of you. They say you pay well. We would consider your offer to sign up for {reg0} peningas.
I cannot imagine fighting without warriors of such fine quality by my side. Welcome to my army.
Oho! The way I see it, you should be paying me for such an opportunity. Forget it!
Why, you're just the sort of company I have been seeking so hard to find!
Never mind. It was just the mead talking.
Oh, we've got plenty of payment for you, buttercup.
That's funny. Now my spear has something to say to you.
We'll leave you in peace.
My {reg59?lady:lord}, we're only poor farmers from the village of {s11}. {reg1?We are taking our products to the market at {s12}.:We are returning from the market at {s12} back to our village.}
Sto inseguendo un gruppo di banditi che corrispondono a questa descrizione... Li avete visti?
Allora, vedremo quanto sarete poveri dopo che avrò preso tutto quello che avete!
Proseguite per la vostra strada, dunque. Arrivederci.
Hey! I'm a lord from {s1} but my only fief is the sea. What do you want?
Prepare your crew! We will fight!
I give you greeting, since I'm a friend of your kingdom.
Nothing, I take my leave now.
My {reg59?lady:lord}, we're only poor fishermen from {s11}.
Allora, vedremo quanto sarete poveri dopo che avrò preso tutto quello che avete!
Is fishing important for {s11}?
Proseguite per la vostra strada, dunque. Arrivederci.
{s11} has a {s21} fishing fleet. Usually we {s22}produce enough salt to preserve the fish the fleet brings to port.
Very well. That's all I wanted to know.
Good day, my {reg59?lady:lord}. We're sailing from {s11} to {s12}.
I will board your ship and take all you've got!
Very well. That's all I wanted to know.
Good day, my {reg59?lady:lord}. We're trading slaves from {s11} to {s12}.
{playername}, the jarl of Kennemer sends greetings! As does Death!
{s2}^^Stop!
Let us through. We are emissaries. We come to meet with Aelfred of West Seaxe.
(Attack the Saxon patrol)
(Continue on your way, dodging the Saxon patrol)
--The Saxons move out of your way, allowing you to proceed.--
I know who you are, {playername}. My brother was among those foragers that you attacked. I do not care if you're an emissary or not, you're going to pay for killing my brother.
To arms, they attack!
Stop! Who are you and what do you want?
Today is a good day to die, scum!
Listen, the sons of Ragnar want you dead. Turn back to your camp.
To arms! It's a trap! The Danish attack us! To arms, West Seaxe!
But...
Heill! Men in the farm, we have a prisoner for you!

{playername}, Thank goodness you came! You do not remember me, but I'm one of the king's men who are defending the village. We are few. Thonkrik promised us that you were coming, but we did not believe him. Nobody else has come to our aid. I have been ordered to travel to the king, to urge him to send troops. However, I fear that I won't be in time, because the Viking ships are already approaching.
Continue on your way and tell the king it is I that defend Doccinga, not his jarl.
Forget your task. All men are needed in Doccinga.
I do not know who you are, traveler, but my men are around you and will not hesitate to kill you if you keep moving. This is our land. Now go back the way you came.
To arms, my men. Kill them all!
Are you Thiaderd? My name is {playername}. I want to talk.
Thiaderd the Rebel? {s4} sends you his greetings. It is time to die.
Well, I do not want to face you. I'm leaving.
Thiaderd, I am here, your faithful Reginhard. {playername} offered to escort me so I can explain what happened with your brother.
No, stop! I need to talk to Thiaderd!
Stop, Thiaderd! I am here, your faithful Reginhard. {playername} offered to escort me so I can explain what happened with your brother.

That man with you is Reginhard? Damn traitor! You are rather too bold to come here after what you did to my brother. First, we will kill your friends and then cut the blood eagle on you, as did your jarl to my brother! To arms my men! Kill them all!
Damn! Reginhard the Betrayer is with you! Reginhard, you will pay dearly for bringing the jarl's men here! To arms my men! Kill them all!
What?
I am at your service, {reg59?my lady:my lord}
It has been an honor to serve you, {reg59?my lady:my lord}
Si, {playername}? Cosa possiamo fare per Vostra Signoria?
Nient'altro?
Voglio ispezionare la guarnigione del castello.
Of course. Here are our lists. Let me know of any changes you require...
Posso vedere il tuo equipaggiamento ?
Ecco, guarda pure...
Voglio che lasciate il castello e che vi uniate alle mie truppe.
I've grown quite fond of the place, but if it is your wish, {playername}, I'll come with you.
Where would we sleep? You're dragging a whole army with you, {playername}! There's not room for all of us.
[Abbandona]
Do you want me to rejoin you?
Do you want me to rejoin you?
[Enemies take positions against your army. The battle starts.]
[Enemies take positions against your army. The battle starts.]
Non siamo ancora arrivati ?
Non ancora.
I can't wait to get back. I've missed my family so much. I'd give anything to see them again.
{playername}, quando pensate che arriveremo alla nostra destinazione?
Abbiamo ancora molta strada di fronte a noi.
Molto presto. Siamo quasi giunti alla meta.

Ah, voglio godermi la strada per un po'. Non ho intenzione di protestare. Trovo sia molto più piacevole cavalcare negli spazi aperti che stare tutto il giorno in un castello. Sapete? V'invidio. Potete vivere così tutto il tempo.

Questa è una buona notizia. Non che non mi piaccia la vostra Compagnia, ma sento la mancanza dei miei piccoli lussi. Mi spiace di lasciarvi così presto. Promettetemi che se potrete, passerete a trovarmi.
Salve, {playername}, mio primo e migliore vassallo! Attendo il vostro consiglio.
Nient'altro?
Cosa pensate dei progressi che abbiamo fatto fino ad ora ?

{reg11?Abbiamo {reg11} lords dalla nostra parte:Non abbiamo ancora nessun lord con noi!}, mentre {reg21?{s9} ha ancora {reg21} lords che lo supportano:{s9} non ha più alcun lord con sè }. {reg19?Controlliamo {reg13?{reg13} città:} {reg14?{reg14} castelli:} {reg15?e {reg15} villaggi:}:Non abbiamo alcun insediamento}, mentre {reg29?loro hanno {reg23?{reg23} città:} {reg24?{reg24} castelli:} {reg25?e {reg25} villaggi:}:Non hanno alcun insediamento}. Nonostante tutto, {s30}.
Allora, continueremo a combattere e troveremo nuovi lords che ci sostengano !
Sembra che questa ribellione non porti da nessuna parte. Dobbiamo arrenderci.
{playername}, non potete abbandonarmi adesso! Fate sul serio?
Certo! Non posso fornirvi ulteriore sostegno.
Non dicevo sul serio! Combatterò con voi fino alla vittoria.
Siete veramente sicuro della vostra decisione? Non vi perdonerò mai se mi abbandonate!
Sono sicuro.
Lasciatemici pensare ancora.

So be it. Then my cause is lost. There is only one thing to do for me now. I will travel away from Islands to continental Europe, never to come back. With me gone, you may try to make your peace with {s4}.
{reg65?Mia signora:Mio signore}, posso vedere il vostro equipaggiamento?
Ecco, guarda pure...
Se posso chiederlo, mi potete parlare delle vostre abilità?
Bene, andiamo.
Suggerisco che voi decidiate chi debba ottenere un possedimento attualmente privo di un lord protettore.
Che feudo avevate in mente?
Who should receive it?
Niente.
Proseguiamo, {reg65?Mia signora:Mio signore}.
Nient'altro?
Nient'altro?
Come Comandante in Capo, desidero inviare un messaggio ai vassalli del Regno.
Posso vedere il tuo equipaggiamento ?
Ecco, guarda pure...
Tell me about Morrigan.

--She smiles weakly.--^^I'm the Phantom Queen. I'm the one who selects the fallen in battle. In the shape of a crow, flying above the warriors, I take joy in bodies bathed in blood but scorn the corpses wounded in their backs.^^I'm a goddess of the ancient peoples, the same that built the cromlechs long before the sea began to vomit black sails. And I will prevail long after all of you fall into darkness.
Sing for me. I want to hear your song again.
--She smiles.--^^Very well.
How did you end up leading a band of bears and wolves?

When I was alone and desperate, they came to me. It may seem strange, but without the protection of those men that you destroyed, I would have been dead by now. They were my father's men. They took on the skins of beasts and gave me the name of the old goddess, Morrigan, to cause our enemies to fear.

Away from civilization, after I had left everything behind to save myself, they had to kill to survive. That hard life made them crazy and turned them into true beasts. There were times when even I was afraid.^^I loved those men, and for that alone, I hate you for killing them. At the same time, I appreciate you for freeing me from becoming what they became.
Nient'altro?
I want to talk about Flaithbertach's grandchildren.
The children of my brother? I heard he had died, but I cannot believe it.
It is not a rumor. I discovered where they were hiding and told Mael Bresail.
It is a rumor. I gave orders to hide them. They are safe.
We ought to talk about this another time.
Molto bene.
You did what? I should have suspected. You killed my brother and left his children at the mercy of murderers. You're nothing but scum like Mael Bresail. Why not kill me too?
Maybe I shall.
I... I was cheated by Mael Bresail.
Leave me alone. I want to mourn my loss. Soon you will discover what sort of man you've been helping.
You cannot understand how happy I am to hear those words. The children of my brother are still alive! Thank you so much. You're a better person than I expected.
[Kiss her.]
My lady, my tent makes a poor palace without you. I pray you would find me worthy to exalt it.
[Her lips are to yours.]
[Morrigan winks while she smiles at you knowingly.]^^ Wait for me when the whole camp is quiet. I'll be there, my love.
You are a remarkable woman. I could fall in love with you.
--Morrigan looks at you with curiosity, as if waiting for you to take the next step.--^^[ Current Morrigan reluctance: {reg0} ]
You are a beauty, Morrigan.
Your parents were wrong to leave you orphaned.
[Take her hand and smile.]
[You look deeply into her eyes.]
I'm glad to have you with us.
You are either crazy or simply stupid. Forget me.
[She looks at you and smiles. It looks that you've made a good impression.]
[She smiles]
What do you think about me?
I have a precious ring in my possession. Would you like it?
I was only joking about being afraid to enter your lair.
Why not come by my tent tonight?
So... Do you like to hunt?
--She laughs.--^^ I usually cause that feeling.
Thank you. It's a pretty gift. I love rings.
Why do you ask that? Are you so insecure? I prefer bold people!
Years ago, I would have said no, but since then, it was the hunt that allowed me to eat many days. I love hunting now.
We have nothing more to say.
[ Current Morrigan reluctance: {reg0} ]
So just how did your parents die?
[Gently touch her face.]
[Kiss her.]
I have a valuable bracelet in my possession. Would you like it?
What do you like to do for fun?
I do not want to talk about it.
[She smiles and looks at you.]
Warlord, much as I like you, I do not want to kiss you.
I am not just one of your warriors. Keep this for your men.
Right now, I am having fun being with you.
So, a beautiful woman like you must be married.
You're the most beautiful woman I've ever seen.
[Touch her face and kiss her.]
[Smell her hair.]
[Hold her hands.]
That would have been nice, but how could I be married if I spent my life fleeing?
I do not think so. I know there are women who are more beautiful.
[Her lips are to yours.]
What are you doing? Behaving like a wolf! Get away from me!
[She smiles at you and blushes.]
My lady, my tent makes a poor palace without you. I pray you would find me worthy to exalt it.
Wait for me when the whole camp is quiet. I'll be there, my love.
[Morrigan winks while she smiles at you knowingly. You realize she is in love with you.]
Sorry, I have other things to do.
Cosa mi puoi dire delle tue abilità ?
Bene, parliamone...
Dovremo separarci per un po'.
(Give warrior rings and bracelets valued at 3000 peningas)
Thank you, I am proud to receive these rewards.
Leave now.
Oh davvero? Ma non ti aspetterò qui intorno, sai. Andrò in qualche città alla ricerca di un'altro lavoro. È questo ciò che vuoi ?
Actually, there is something I need to tell you.
Così sia. Dobbiamo separarci.
In realtà, preferirei che rimanessi al mio fianco...
Bene. Sono fuori, allora. Cercatemi se avrete bisogno di me.
Ho bisogno di chiedere una cosa.
Niente.
Qual'è la richiesta i?
Come si sta nella Compagnia?
Raccontami ancora la tua storia..
I suppose you know that I aspire to be {reg59?queen:king} of this land?
Avete delle conoscenze che potremmo usare a nostro vantaggio?
I would like to improve my relations with a settlement.
Vorreste possedere un feudo?
Niente.
Poco dopo, ho iniziato a far parte della Compagnia.
Nient'altro?
Umh... Sì. Avevo sentito.
Volete quindi sostenere la mia causa?
Molto bene. Lo terrò a mente.

I would, {s21}. Moreover, I have a proposal on how I might help you attain your throne. However, you recently sent {s22} off on a similar mission. Perhaps we should wait for a couple of weeks to avoid drawing too much attention to ourselves.
Molto bene. Fatelo.
Ci ho ripensato, restate ancora con me
Addio allora, {s21}, per adesso...
What settlement do you have in mind?
Actually, forget about this, maybe later.
Very well. I will travel there and try to improve your relations with {s4}, {s21}.

Of course, as few people as possible should know of this. If you want to collect the information, or pull me out, then don't send a messenger. Come and get me yourself -- even if that means you have to sneak through the gates.
Splendida idea, fatelo.
Veramente ne vorrei restare fuori.
Bene. Dovrei essere in grado di fare rapporto entro cinque giorni circa. Addio allora, {s21}, almeno per il momento.
È tempo, ragazzi! Andategli addosso!
Stop! You bring many boats with you. Who are you, and what do you want?
My name is {playername}. Are you the army from the Kingdom of Asturias?
My name is {playername}. I come in accordance with the agreements with West Seaxe.
My name is {playername}. I come to negotiate on behalf of the sons of Ragnar.
Yes, and if you know who we are, you can only come from West Seaxe.

I see. Well, my job is not to trust anyone, but stay alert. If your fleet moves, we will attack you. You'll go with two or three men to our ship, and we will take you to the village to talk to our leaders. Five of our men will go to your ship as hostages to guarantee your safety.
Let's go!
Risparmiatemi! Risparmiatemi! Risparmiate la mia vita! Liberatemi e me ne andrò lontano da qui, imparerò un mestiere onesto... Non sentirete mai più parlare di me! Mai più! Lo giuro!

Risparmierò la tua vita, ma in cambio voglio informazioni. Voi o i vostri compagni avete rapito il fratello di un eminente mercante della città. Dimmi dove lo trattenete, e se mi dai la tua parola che smetterai di creare problemi alla gente di queste parti, potrai andartene libero.
Che cosa volete?
Stavo cercando proprio te. Dimmi dove tenete i vostri prigionieri e vi lascerò andare.
Vi lasceremo in pace, per questa volta...
Hah! Quei prigionieri saranno liberati solo se pagherete il loro riscatto. Avete portato il denaro?
No, ma ho portato l'acciaio!
Oh bless you, {reg59?my lady:my lord}. Bless you. We've done the lad no harm. We've been keeping him in our hideout near {s9}. I'll describe the area nearby in detail, so there's no mistaking it...
Beautiful work, {playername}! Let me have my {reg33} peningas. I hope you got your fair share from the weeping men of {s33}.
Shame on you, {playername}! You are a miserable failure. You couldn't even defeat those weeping men of {s33}.
{playername}, lo avete salvato! Vi sarò sempre riconoscente per aver liberato mio {s11}. Vi prego, prendete questo denaro come piccolo ringraziamento per il vostro nobile e coraggioso gesto.
È sempre un onore servirvi, {s65}.

Are you all right? Well... I guess you're alive, at any rate. I'm not sure that we can say the same for the other fellow. That's one less thief to trouble our streets at night, although Heaven knows he won't be the last... Anyway, maybe you can help me with something. Let's talk more inside. Out here, we don't know who is listening.

Splendido lavoro. Avete raccolto abbastanza uomini da impiegare contro i banditi. Ora, dei viaggiatori arrivati a {s9} ci hanno detto che c'è un piccolo gruppo di briganti in agguato all'esterno della città. Io sospetto che facciano parte delle stessa banda, quella che ha preso mio fratello. Dategli la caccia e sconfiggeteli, fatevi anche rivelare la posizione del loro nascondiglio!

So, you've found out where they hid my brother? Splendid work. I flatter myself that I'm a fine judge of character, and you look to be a {reg59?woman:man} who can get things done. Now, go out and save his unworthy hide!

Well... My brother is home safe. I'm not sure what to do with him -- maybe pack him off to a university outside the Northlands. That way, if he gets knocked on the head in a street brawl, no one can say it's my fault. But that's not your problem. Here's the rest of your reward. It was well earned.
Questo denaro è benvenuto, e io sono felice di avervi potuto aiutare.
Ottimo! Ora... Desiderate fare qualcos'altro?
Forse. Di cos'avete bisogno?

Remember how I told you that the bandits had an ally inside the walls? I think I know who it is -- the captain of the watch, no less. Some months ago, this captain, seeing the amount of profit we merchants were making from trade across the frontiers, decided to borrow some money to sponsor a caravan. Unfortunately, like many who are new to commerce, he failed to realize that great profit only comes with great risk. So he sank all his money into the most expensive commodities, and of course, his caravan was captured and looted, and he lost everything.

As a consequence, it seems, our captain turned to villainy to recoup his fortune. I supposed I'd do the same if, the Heavens forbid, I ever faced indebtedness and ruination. Now, any watch captain worth his salary will have a few thieves and robbers on his payroll, to inform on the rest, but our captain decides to employ these bastards wholesale. He brings them into the town, lets them do as they will, and takes a share of their take. You've heard of poachers turning gamekeepers? Well, in the unfortunate land of the Northlands, sometimes gamekeepers will turn poacher. Luckily, there are still a few brave, honest souls in the watch who've told me how he works.

Ecco il mio piano. Potrei portare la situazione all'attenzione di {s4}, signore della città, ma ciò significherebbe un'indagine, sarebbe solo la mia parola contro quella del Capitano, e i testimoni possono essere corrotti... Le prove distrutte, forse il tutto sarà dimenticato se il nemico si rifugia nuovamente oltre il confine, e tutto quello che otterrei sarebbe un coltello tra le costole. In tempo di guerra, voi lo sapete, gli occhi di un Re guardano lontano dal suo dominio, e i suoi sudditi soffrono. Per questo ho avuto un'altra idea. Ho messo insieme un piccolo gruppo di cittadini, alcuni sono miei lavoratori, altri hanno perso dei familiari a causa di questi banditi; porteremo la tempesta a casa del capitano e lo metteremo in catene prima di {s4}, se possibile catturando anche qualche bandito che possa testimoniare come stanno le cose.
Quello di cui ora ho bisogno è qualcuno che guidi la mia piccola armata in battaglia, e non posso pensare a nessuno migliore di voi. Allora cosa ne dite?
Come faccio a sapere che mi state dicendo la verità?

Oh, well, I suppose it's possible that I found a dozen bandits who were willing to give their lives to give a passing stranger a false impression of life in old {s4}... Well, I guess you can't really know if my word is good, but I reckon you've learned by now that my money is good, and there's another 100 peningas, or maybe a bit more, that's waiting for you if you'll do me this last little favor. So what do you say?
All right, I'll lead your men.
Mi spiace. Sta avvenendo tutto troppo in fretta. Ho bisogno di tempo per pensarci.
